values:
I was watching Just Go With It earlier. It made me cry. Gawd, it stir some emotions again. I'm so emotional this time of the year. I'm sorry.

"she's good, she's very nice. there's only one problem...she's not you...she's not you!"

Can't help but cry when i saw your photos again. You looked so happy with your family. I know that you'd be a great dad. I should be happy for you, i am happy for you but i just can't help it. Its not as overwhelming and painful as it was before but i just can't shake the fact that you're already leading and living your life while i'm still stuck in here.  You don't have to explain things again...i understand...she is your CONSTANT...i'm just a VARIABLE in your life.

Oh God, make these pain go away!
...if you won't beat for the right person...might as well don't beat at all!

Dear MD,

ok you win...
i lied! i thought i was ok...but i  guess i am not. 
believe me i tried my best to let go of whatever it  is that is eating me inside but it just won't go away easily. 
once  again, the chicken in me could not even email/call/SMS/PM you. 
i  know that i'm being difficult lately...i'm such a pain in the ass...so  stubborn...hard headed and all.

but this time i won't shy  away...I NEED YOUR HELP...badly!

~daps

There you go again, always popping in to my life during unguarded  moments. Just when i thought i was moving miles away you'd appear in my  life again; like a thief in the night stealing everything I have gained  since you've left. 
 
 No matter how hard i stay away from you, one way or the other i would  always be drawn to you like the pulling of gravity. And there i go  again, drowning in my own emotional abyss. Back to my inconsolable  self...unfocused...wounded...bleeding.
 
 Things can't be undone anymore, it's clear to me that it is over. Don't  make things hard for both of us. As i've said before...i don't want to  be the ghost in your current relationship...for crying out loud, you're  going to be a FATHER...you're going to be a HUSBAND...I'm tired of this  useless depression, useless pain, useless fear...i have a life to live  too! Spare me with your lies and broken promises...i had enough...this  is too much!
 LEAVE ME ALONE!

We both know that...that was the end of it. i will no longer allow myself to be hurt by you...i had enough. Last Saturday was both liberating and kinda sad for me. But that was the right thing to do. I'm still in pain...i'm at lost for words. Can't even put down my thoughts into writing...i'm still disoriented. But i'm quite positive that i'll be ok.

I'm doing good in general, after all that i've went through last 2007 and as 2008 is about to end, i know i can handle things whatever life throws my way.  But as days passed by i couldn't help but to feel anxious. Decisions has been made already on his part. His choice was definitely not me, i understand it without bitterness, eversince we've been together i know that i'm only 2nd or 3rd on his list . 

The sad thing about our relationship is that somehow we outgrown each other...distance really took its toll on us...i got used to, him not being around. We've gone through so much, i've endured so much pain, up to the point when he lured me to what we are now. I've made a lot of wrong turns too, i'm even guilty of emotional infidelity, i don't even think i can look him in the eye...i think now is the time to be back on track again... to be in control! this time i will do what i should have done last april...i hope the good Lord will give me the strength to accomplish it this time around. 

Cliche as it may seem but it's for our own good. 

we've tried to work things out but it can't go on like that forever...its not just a simple issue of "you and me" or "you and i" ... a lot of people are involved already...people he cares about. time and fate is not even on our side. He still have plans...but i need execution! i guess we're not really meant to be!

i wanted to write something about you in my xanga but i'm not ready yet...the pain is still fresh...who have thought that it would cost me such pain given the fact that we don't have any "personal relationship". you barely look me in the eye the last time we went out...i was waiting for you to say sorry or explain your side bu t i guess you're made to believe that you owe me no explanation...i could still hear your voice, your laugh even your cries...

...i wish you well.

As what i've posted on my other blog...if there's really such a thing as "emotional infidelity" i am definitely guilty of the crime...can't elaborate on the details yet, 'coz at the moment  my mind is so cluttered. so many things rushing in my head, so many thoughts that even i couldn't even figure out what to do...or  what to say.

...for goodness sake, i know i have to stop all of these...i've hurt a lot of people already. and this is not my way of getting back on him...

sorry!

Hello LJ,

How have you've been? I'm so preoccupied with a lot of things that i somehow forgot you. If you're wondrin' what happened to me and that "special someone" that i always wrote about here...well we're doing good. No we're not a couple as we used to before, but we're friends...in fact i'm loving the set up hehe. Eventually i know we really have to let go, but at the moment we're enjoying whatever it is that we have...

As for me, i'm enjoying things...family, work, friends and hmmm..some "sweet moments" with someone...although i know that the "no-strings attached" thingy that i'm imposing on myself and this friend, will somehow backfire in the end..i'll just let it be. 

So there it is, i'll try to update you whenever i have the time and the energy.

Thanks for always listening.

Love,

Me

I'm feeling tired right now, i only have 12 hours of sleep for the past 3 days(that's cumulative huh!)...i'm sleepy but i've been tossing and turning for the past 2 hours, don't ask me why coz i don't know either. Maybe because, for the past week, i've been exposed to a lot of people asking me about him...about us...what happened...blah blah blah...which somehow triggers the praning button on. Been thinking too much na naman kasi!

Received some text from a colleague asking me about certain electrical specs (ayos sa timing!)
Bravely got the PEC...tried and attempted to find the provisions he's asking but yeah the sight of the book still stir some emotions...somehow i got so scared of reading or opening that damn book anymore,  i'm kinda imagining things that some stupid letter will dropped off the book and put me back from where those episodes started. Some of you would find it trivial or dense... but that book... my book, sort of  Electrical Engineer's bible... the book he borrowed from me...the book where i found his love letter for her... so i still got issues here ha? i guess its one of those moments when i'm being reminded of things that i should be forgetting already but i just couldn't. Tell me how? then i really would just shrug it off.

Tried to fold some roses but it doesn't look good, end up with a crumpled paper, so i just threw it away. Folded 4 pieces of paper cranes but still couldn't sleep...ate a couple of brownies but doesn't feel so good pa rin.

ok na ko eh, bakit ganito pa rin? i had a good headstart na...don't want to spoil it.

Oh God... just let these feelings go away!

I just realized that saying sorry is just as difficult as saying thank you! (if you know what i'm talking!)


"The Pieces Don't Fit Anymore"
James Morrison


I've been twisting and turning in a space that's too small
I've been drawing the line and watching it fall
You've been closing me in , closing the space in my heart
Watching us fading and watching us fall apart

Well I can't explain why it's not enough
Coz I gave it all to you
And if you leave me now
Oh just leave me now
It's the better thing to do

It's time to surrender
It's been too long pretending
There's no use in trying
When the pieces don't fit anymore

Oh, don't misunderstand how I feel
Coz I've tried, yes I've tried
Still I don't know why
No I don't know why

Why I can't explain why it's not enough
Coz I gave it all to you
And if you leave me now
Oh just leave me now
It's the better thing to do

It's time to surrender
It's been too long pretending
There's no use in trying
When the pieces don't fit anymore
The pieces don't fit anymore

You pulled me under so I had to give in
Such a beautiful mess that's breaking my skin
Well I'll hide all the bruises; I'll hide all the damage that's done
But I show how I'm feeling until all the feeling has gone

Well I can't explain why it's not enough
Coz I gave it all to you
And if you leave me now
Oh just leave me now
It's the better thing to do

It's time to surrender
It's been too long pretending
There's no use in trying
When the pieces don't fit anymore
The pieces don't fit anymore

My mom's worried about you too. i didn't tell her anything, it was clarisse who told her. clarisse and cathy are also worried about you.

call them please...it would be a big relief for me. 

miss you bru!

I'm sure all of you know the degree of adjectives... absolute(positive), comparative and superlative

example:
absolute - mighty
comparative - mightier
superlative - mightiest

let's try to use it in sentences:

"a friend  someone, left an offline message for me that says: "words are mightier than the sword".
yeah right! and i say: "...but silence is the mightiest of them all" 
tsk...tsk...tsk! so this is what you want huh? don't try my patience! for the sake of our friendship...i'm raising the white flag! i'm sorry! will you please talk to me, coz i have no idea if i've done something wrong to you, for you to keep your distance. i believe i have the right to know if i'm the source, the trigger or whatever part i am in your little episodes. i'm sick and tired of mind games...just tell me if you want me out of your life...and painful as it is... i will gladly leave!
bru! magparamdam ka naman! need to tell you a lot of things!

i'm so tired of these vicious cycle. things are just coming one after the other. sometimes i don't want to care at all. my kid sister thinks i'm the reincarnation of Hitler.  i've been observing her for the last couple of months, she barely hear a word from me, i just let our folks handle her, to avoid furthermore friction. Last night was the culmination, i yelled at her (which i rarely do)and confronted her and tell her that don't make a fool of us.

Earlier i had this note from her (we share the same workspace kasi):

"thanks for looking out for me sis, but you don't have to do it anymore. That person already left me a month ago. (isn't it enough?)"

So it's my fault again? i'm the bad one, as always! i know that she's 16, and she had to go through that phase, but not with that person. she could have all the guys in the world but not that one.

i'm just so fucking tired of everything... attending to everyone's need... God i have i life too. it's just so sad that these people inflicting pain are the ones we call family!

my best friend's mom died a day after her 56th birthday. I knew that she's already with My Favorite Author and that she has lived her life the way she wanted it, but i just can't help but to feel sad. Please pray for her soul and at the same time please pray for my best friend.
 Bru, don't know what else to say. You still have us, me and  my whole family...whenever you want to go back here in the Philippines, you're always welcome at our place. *hugs*

i remember a friend once told me... "little but lasting, is better than, much but passing!".  and yeah i definitely agree with her.  *wink wink*

you know this john mayer song? ... sad isn't it? but you know what ? its a happy song for me hahaha...
perfect for slow dancing  naks! yihee...


Dreaming With A Broken Heart
John Mayer

When you're dreaming with a broken heart
The waking up is the hardest part
You roll outta bed and down on your knees
And for the moment you can hardly breathe
Wondering was she really here?
Is she standing in my room?
No she's not, 'cause she's gone, gone, gone, gone, gone....

When you're dreaming with a broken heart
The giving up is the hardest part
She takes you in with your crying eyes
Then all at once you have to say goodbye
Wondering could you stay my love?
Will you wake up by my side?
No she can't, 'cause she's gone, gone, gone, gone, gone....
Oooooooooohhhhhhhhh

Now do i have to fall asleep with roses in my hand
Do i have to fall asleep with roses in my hand?
Do i have to fall asleep with roses in my hand?
Do i have to fall asleep with roses in my hand?
Would you get them if i did?
No you won't, 'cause you're gone, gone, gone, gone, gone....

When you're dreaming with a broken heart
The waking up is the hardest part

So he's here, he arrived friday night (082407). I was surprised last monday when i dropped the book his kid sister is borrowing from me. i thought he'd be here first week of september but for some reasons it was moved a little early, but he's just staying for a week.

i know that for the past 12 months or so, i've been trying to move on and have a life of my own, away from his memories, but unfortunately i'm still struggling! Over the past few months we've been handling our "relationship" maturely, far from the "immature couple" that we were then.

Seeing him last monday somehow brought me back to the fantasy world, its quite an experience feeling those different kind of emotions again. when i stood in their driveway and heard him calling her sister and telling her "dumating na ata yung bisita mo",  i really thought i was just hearing voices. and then he opened the gate, and we both stared in awe, i just couldn't believe he's there.  Automatically we gave each other a hug. Normally i would always tease him when i see him in his apron and wipe the sweat forming on his forehead but at that moment i was really absorbed by my emotions. Yaayy... a year ago, i was at that same house, fighting back my tears from blocking my sight as i hurriedly walked out of the door... and now, there i was infront of the man who put me in that predicament, without any feeling of bitterness for him. i guess the love we feel for each other and our constant communication somehow took away that ill-feeling.

i spent the whole afternoon with them, and there was no single sign of awkwardness between us. and that's one thing that's disturbing me. being too comfortable with someone... specifically someone from the past would only lead into a seemingly platonic relationship. and that is some sort of validation of those battles in my head...the thing is, ideally its still  him whom i want to spent my whole life with. i mean factor out the distance and whatever it is that happened in the past, it's still him i want to be with... but realistically speaking, set-up like these, and with the person that i am, i'm sure that it would just lead to a lifelong friendship (ang gulo ko, basta yun na yun hehe)...not that i don't want it but i just somehow feel it ( ok maybe i'm just too afraid to risk again or im just too afraid to commit again!). but as it is, i think i'm gonna live it this way, whether he's a friend or a lover, the important thing is that he's there for me.

if you're gonna ask me if i'm still in love with him? i would say, yeah i do... but...

darn pity me!

what a way to start my morning. it was supposed to be reconciliation call right? what happened there? i'd like to think that there's something wrong with me, that it was my fault, but after all those things that you've said, it made me feel that i wasn't solely to blame. we've passed through this a lot of times..."the i'm jealous with your other friends thing, the you're not answering my calls and all those stuff" .... i really thought that we're well-versed at that. i have nothing against how you're feeling...with all those stuff that's going on with your life(mamu's condition for instance) i know full well that you're quite sensitive right now. what irritates me is the way you said things about this friend of mine who's somehow the object of your jealousy. i just don't get it bru, i never thought you'd be that judgemental...you haven't met her, haven't seen her, haven't been with her...all you know about her are those things that "some people" feeds you. i won't try to defend her anymore, either you take my  explanation or not...she's no bad influence... what i am now is base on my own actions not them.

"kung kayo nahihirapan na sa akin(as what most of u are saying).... ano pa kaya yung ako mismo sa sarili ko...do you think i want all of these?"

and if you'll gonna tell me that you're just concern and that its for my own good... i won't buy that, i would just suggest that you stop talking to my mom coz she have no idea how i am feeling. i just want to feel that you're there for me despite the distance... pati ba naman ikaw wala ng tiwala sa akin?

lets not make distance take a hold of us. and i'm telling you... i don't like this either. and damn i miss you... a lot!

i'm so used to fighting my battles on my own......sorry ! but i'm still gonna do it my way. i appreciate all your concerns after all you're my parents...but aren't  you a decade too late to help me with my problems? you mold  me to be like these.... tough...carefree and all.  but as your obedient daughter i would still give in to your requests...yun lang naman ang papel ko sa mundo!!!  sorry if i'm such a failure!

Sober
Kelly Clarkson

 

And I don't know
This could break my heart or save me
Nothing's real
Until you let go completely
So here I go with all my thoughts I've been saving
So here I go with all my fears weighing on me

Three months and I'm still sober
Picked all my weeds but kept the flowers
But I know it's never really over

And I don't know
I could crash and burn but maybe
At the end of this road I might catch a glimpse of me
So I won't worry about my timing, I want to get it right
No comparing, second guessing, no not this time

Three months and I'm still breathing
Been a long road since those hands I left my tears in but I know
It's never really over, no

Wake up

Three months and I'm still standing here
Three months and I'm getting better yeah
Three months and I still am

Three months and it's still harder now
Three months I've been living here without you now
Three months yeah, three months

Three months and I'm still breathing
Three months and I still remember it
Three months and I wake up

Three months and I'm still sober
Picked all my weeds but kept the flowers
sometimes i wonder if there's a big sign hanging on my forehead that says..."HURT ME!"

Too many things in my head, haaayyy. Damn work, they're taking my soul!

on i lighter note,  i had to shutdown my blogspot account for some personal reasons or um should i simply put it this way: that blog has so much blood all over. it makes me cringe everytime i read my entries there, full of angst and pain. and besides i'm having troubles memorizing user names and passwords, in fact before i could make an entry here at LJ i had to try signing in 5 times because i forgot my password. speaking of which i also forgot my password in this online banking thing, fabulous! i know, i know i should have a generic password but due to some unforseen circumstances in my life lately i had to change them. haaayyy, up to now i've been trying to figure out if i entered a wrong password or perhaps it was the user name?

i think i need to rest now, brain cells are not cooperating well.

bru, pagalawin mo lang yung kurtina tapos kahit mangamoy kandila pa ayos lang basta magparamdam ka lang!

...i would lie if i'll tell you i don't feel anything for you anymore, because i still do it's not just like the way it was before...

..but i would also lie if i tell you i want us back together because i really don't.

...after my long vacation, a vacation well spent i just realized that it wasn't you who's causing so much misery in my life, it was my pride...ur just the one who triggers it, but i'm okay now...i have fully acknowledged it.

...come to think of it mas mahirap palang i-heal ang broken pride kesa sa broken heart hehe.
Ang kulit nito....

ayos sa entry, gusto kong maiyak hahaha. and the header? hmmmm, talaga lang ha? 
military guy? sus, san kaya niya napagkukuha yung mga ganung balita...

http://www.xanga.com/hasty06

guilt trip ba yan? so who's lonely now!

tsk tsk tsk, makes me wanna sing ala Kelly Clarkson...to the tune of since you've been gone... but nope, you have to get me drunk first before i do so hahaha.

Been busy with work lately, haven't got the chance to go on line or even reply to text messages sent by friends especially if it is not that important. I'm doing good...i'm almost there, i just hope there'd be no more distractions from you know who. 

Received a lot of off line messages from him, even emails and SMS. Somehow his messages still touches my heart, but i could say that it's not on the same level as it used to before. 

He's on line right now,but i'm not replying to his messages, ok so as not to feel guilty i logged off YM. I don't know how to react, he told me that he's finally getting the break that he wanted from work but he's not happy, he shouldn't have accepted his work abroad, at least he'd still have me daw. 
He's off to Texas 3rd week of march with a different team daw (meaning to say, away from that "girl"), hahaha wala lang as if it would change everything. Tsk tsk tsk...ayan lumalabas na naman sungay  ko.

Tapos na akong mag-inarte, sya naman. Di ako sanay na ganun sya. Langya he even signed up to xanga just to peek in my world.

Whew...ok na kami... i hope he'll leave it that way, after all i have my dreams to fullfill din naman, pero this time minus him! And i'm determined to do that!


" class="ljvideo">

i was asked by a friend to name at least 5 people i keep coming back to, at the same time name at least 5 people i never want to crossed paths with...she asked me to answer/list whoever comes first in my head...as in randomly.

funny, coz he's in both list!!! :-(

Reason to Believe
Rod Stewart

If I listened long enough to you
I'd find a way to believe that it's all true
Knowing that you lied straight-faced while I cried
Still I look to find a reason to believe

Someone like you makes it hard to live without
somebody else
Someone like you makes it easy to give
never think about myself

If I gave you time to change my mind
I'd find a way just to leave the past behind
Knowing that you lied straight-faced while I cried

If I listened long enough to you
I'd find a way to believe that it's all true
Knowing that you lied straight-faced while I cried
Still I look to find a reason to believe

Someone like you makes it hard to live without
somebody else
Someone like you makes it easy to give
never think about myself

when you've run out of patience...
you can have mine.
it isn't that much
but it'll let you hang in there for a while,
and somehow it'll let you stay on track.

when you've run out of words to say;
and cry endlessly instead...
it's alright...i don't mind!
Coz our best conversations ever
are those in between sobs or when we just sit side by side in silence.

when you've run out of strength...
you CAN'T have mine!
coz we'll both fall down 
instead lay your back against mine...
take some rest... i'm with you all the time.

when you've run out of faith...
let me hold your hands
we'll pray together.
and let HIM do all the wonders;
then we'll continue the fight.

...jing.... what's going on? i know you're going through a lot. call me please... if ur not ready to talk, just let me know how you're doin ok? i know i haven't been the pillar of strength that you used to run to before...but hey the drama's over
i'm starting to get so worried.

i know how much it sucks...how much we hate the fact that i'm here and you're there, but all the same i'm just here...

cry if you must...but don't let it consume you.

hug mamu for me.

...thanks for the flowers and the balloons. I was about to call you to say thanks but tears got in the way.
...thanks for singing to me, i've missed that a lot.

See, we're better of as friends.

Darn, the chocolate cake makes me feel guilty!!!

I'm so tempted to send him "his letter" with a note that says: "SA'YO ATA 'TO, NAIWAN MO SA LIBRO KO, BY THE WAY IT'S SO WELL CRAFTED HUH!"
I wish that what happend last week was the final blow, coz i'm so f***ing tired of these feelings. 



"...If I turn into another
Dig me up from under what is covering the better part of me.
Sing this song (sing this song).
Remind me that we'll always have each other,
When everything else is gone.
oohhhh each other, when everything else is gone...."

I haven't had a nice laugh for the past how many months? 5 months? Not until yesterday, i had a nice time with my qorp(HS friends). That was a blast, at least, for a moment i got distracted. Almost 10 hours of non-stop talking, goofing around, food tripping and reminiscing hehehe. After 2 long years, we were able to see each other, i mean the 6 of us. Usually i only got to see some of them, especially during the times when i was too busy with you know who/what. I hope i could post the pix, but unfortunately the downloading cable of my phone is somewhere else, and i don't want to go back to that place anymore(baka kung ano pang makita ko, atakihin lang ako sa puso).

I'd like to think i'm ok, but i'm really not, i'm having those episodes again. I don't know when will it stop. After the goodbyes, i should be okay right? But its not like that, seems like the whole world is conspiring against me, those unwanted circumstances, darn i couldn't handle it anymore. When will this be really over? I hope i know the answer. I hope it's just as easy as making a time line and making it happen, but its not like that. The only good thing about this whole situation is that i appreciate my family and friends more than ever. If not for them, i really don't know what could have happened to me.

Jing, sorry for last friday, i restricted all incoming international calls. Miss you a lot bru.

"...weird, pero napanaginipan na naman kita...saving me from falling!"

Christmas passed by just like that... i survive it though, thank heavens! I even completed the simbang gabi, that's something huh? Just keeping the faith hehe, baka sakaling maawa si Lord sa akin, at alisin nya lahat ng sakit na nararamdaman ko ;-)

So he's here during the holiday season, i was surprised really i was, but i wasn't excited the way i should be, if things between me and him are ok.  But it gave us the chance to talk, as in the real talk. And just when i thought i've done one of the bravest things before the year ended... drum roll please.... that is saying goodbye. I'm still scared as ever and i  could still feel the pain.

And guess how i welcome 2007... sad trip na naman!!! And mind you i threw up every food i've eaten, and i wasn't drunk huh? Upset stomach i guess.

Lessons learned? Just like in construction and timber design... sometimes its better to burn the whole wood columns infested by termites rather than apply termite treatments. There's no use keeping that hollow piece of wood, because eventually it will fall down.

I was able to watched season 5 of Smallville's courteousy of my kid sister, and guess what, the one thing that never leaves my head after watching it was the word... TRUTH.  Haaaaaaaaayyyyyy... "smallville"... you should know better. 
:-(

"...none of my best efforts to let you know that i have change matters to you anymore, i know ur having a hard time, and its not fair to you if we're gonna continue this just because i say so, i'm giving u the freedom that ur yearning for, im not ready to let go of u yet, but if doing such will make u happy, make u feel better and be on tracked again, i will do so, after all i was the one who put us into this mess. im sorry...i really am. i still love you, i hope you know that...i'll always be here for you"

I have pictured this to happen, eventually he'll get tired, he would give up, and let go of me. Don't know what else to feel, coz i have anticipated this. Though his words still pierce my every being, guess thats the way it should be. There's no use of "staying together"  in this so-called "undefine" relationship that we had. It's time to really move on and let go and since this time, there's no more holding back from both sides, i think we'll have all the freedom to move forward. I've said this a thousand times, i have forgiven him! The problem is i haven't forgiven myself yet, for things that i have done...not done... or could have done. Maybe we're not really meant for each other.

Of course i'm still hurting, who wouldn't? But i think i'm slowly getting there, less crying moments during the night, i think the almost "breakdown" that i had last week change everything, i'm just so lucky my father was around, otherwise don't know what else could have happened.

This time around, when i make a step forward there would no more blaming, no more enmity and as mush as possible no more looking back. So i'll pour down my thoughts for him one last time.

"I never expected  you to be oh-so-perfect, i know u had ur flaws, after all just like me you are human, subject to commit mistakes and such. I'm no risk taker, i don't even believe in LDR but with you and for you i have taken all the risk, and yes it was worth it. I have even pictured in mind that as a man(with such set up like ours), u are more prone to find comfort, care and love from another person and i was cool about that and i remember telling that to you half-heartedly. But you were so firm in telling me that it won't happened and i believe you. And thats what makes it more painful...you...lying and hiding things from me. I wanted to trust you again, but i find it hard to do so. Iam no longer capable of distinguishing the truth from the lies and as much as i try to understand you i can't figure out why you have opted to conceal everything that was related to her and your so-called one week fling. I will no longer go further about it. All i wanted from you is your honesty...thats all i have asked from you, and unfortunately you have failed me. Thank you for everything. Hope things would be a lot better now that we have decided to go on separate ways.Don't worry about me, i'll be okay, i will try to."

I wrote him a 3-paged letter, i don't know if i'm going to send it or not. I'm tired. Don't know how to start things, don't know which direction to go. Don't know what's going on with me, they say its a phase, its normal, that i'll passed through it...well i hope it'll be over soon. Sometimes it pays to be not so well-padded.

I could feel that my little world is crumbling, it fell like bricks...hard, fast, painful, one indomitable chunk after the other and once again i was caught off guard. I realize that moving on and letting go isn't all about letting time sort everything, but it demands individual effort, its not about pampering the pain, but more of nursing your own wounds. And as what most friends would say, its about acceptance... its a choice. 

I know this is going to be a long and tedious process. It made me realize that life doesn't pause in between punches, but it relentlessly deals blow by blow. And i know this time i have to face the fight on my own, and hopefully i won't throw down my towel, but rather welcome the pain and let it penetrate me fully, embrace all the heartaches, submerge myself once again into that emotional abyss and then finally stand up and say that i'm healed. I know someday, somehow i'll be fine. Only then, can i tell that i have conquered and i am ready to trust once again.... until that time..

umuwi ka na kaya dito!!!

After all the fun, after all the 3 days/nights drinking spree, after all those celebration, nothing could change the fact that my day was incomplete, and yeah i still ache for you. It was so thoughtful of you to send those flowers, to send me those gifts, to send your cousin with our favorite cake. It was overwhelming also that your mom called to greet me on my special day, you really know how to get into me.

Noticed the progress we have made the past few weeks? No more talks about it. We're good at it, aren't we? I know i can't speak for you, because i have no idea how ur handling things ur way, but i know u can manage, i know u will manage, i just know u would.

The moment i enter my room after all of them had left,  this damn feeling of missing you, of being with you evades me, it didn't spare my birthday...haaaaayyyyyyyy. Don't ask me if i still love you, don't ask me about how and what i feel, don't tell me to stop acting as if i don't care coz its hurting you...iam hurting too. Don't tell me how i will react to every situation, especially if that situation somehow does not agree with what i feel, coz what i feel counts,  don't tell me all those things coz i might give in again. I'm trying to convince myself that i never want to talk to you again, to cut all the communication lines that we have, to set all these feelings aside, after all there's no more you and me. I have pictured what might happened that night, at exactly 12MN u called, we've talked, u we're holding back ur tears, i was holding mine too. But what difference could those tears make? Could it make all the scars disappear? Could it heal me? Could those tears cut the distance that you...we've created? You know the answer, so please let us stop this mind games...i'm so tired. It's already clear, u have betray my trust, u have to leave... i have to stay. 

I've watched close by... reality pierced.....OOOUUUCHHH!!!

Jing, belated happy birthday. Thanks for the book and the CDs. I wasn't drunk yet when you called,  if u had called an hour later, u would have flewn all the way from UK just to castigate me. I'm sorry.  Tell mamu, i'm okay.  We could have celebrated our birthday together huh? I miss you.

Not so long ago, i wish for courage... courage to take the risk and let my heart took the driver seat.  And now, if i had one wish, i would still wish for courage... but this time, not to take the risk and fall in love again but more of courage to move on and let go. And it would be a lot easier if we're gonna move on at the same pace, otherwise it would be another totally devastating experience for me. Geesh, i sound so selfish there...

I know that things between me and him would never be the same anymore...at the moment it's way too impossible. 
I have forgiven him...definitely! But i haven't forgotten all those things yet . Most of the times i am being reminded of  it, whether through other people, through friends, or through some other similar circumstances. 

Well, i guess i have to wish so hard.

Haven't been LJ-ing for a while. Been busy with life. Limited net connection at the office, net connection problem at home due to typhoon Milenyo... plus the usual problems brought about that thing we call... LOVE.

I can't say i'm doing good, but i'm coping, trying to survive each day, but not really sure where i'm heading. For the past few weeks i feel like giving up, i've almost given up, but thank goodness... friends are just around the corner to give you hugs, advices and most especially their silence.

Work's giving me so much headache lately. The boss putting me in hot waters. After he didn't accept my resignation he's offering me a new position that will caused for 3 people to lose their job. I can't decide. The boss needed me, i knew that... but these people needed their job more than i need mine. I'm ready to go, find a new job, since i don't find my work fulfilling anymore. The hard part is that 2 of these people are among my closests friend in the plant. Haaayyyyy... life.

Jing, i know i promise i wont smoke anymore....but i just couldn't.... chain smoker na best friend mo... sorry.

Akala ko sa telenovela lang pwedeng mangyari yun...

sa totoong buhay din pala.

As usual i lost the battle again, siya lang talaga ang may kayang tibagin ang defense wall ko.

The Distance

The sun has turned to grey

I crawl up in the corner
As I watch the minutes pass
Each one brings me closer to

I can't take the miles

"....but tonight, i just want to hear your heartbeat...beating just for me"

 -June 6, 2005-


Why do i love you?

Because i can tell you anything, even those stupid things and i know you wouldn't laugh at me.
Because i can still see your face even when i closed my eyes.
Because just the sound of your name makes my heart flutter bringing chills down my spine.
Because each song i sing sounds so melodic even if its out of tune.
Because when i look into your eyes, i can see your soul in all its radiance, so mesmerizing and yet it never reveals everything to me.
Because when i'm with you, you bring out the sensitivity in me without overpowering my masculinity.
Because you make me re-discover myself.
Because you help me turn my weaknesses into strengths.
Because you're not only my girl, but you're also my friend.
Because when i held you in my arms, i also feel safe.
Because the sound of your voice revives me after a day's work.
Because your infamous sarcastic remarks always leaves a smile on my face.
Because thinking of you makes the world stop for a moment leaving all the absurdity behind.
Because you make me feel like a poet, a writer, like Shakespeare or Keats.
And most of all, i love you because...

Despite the distance, your patience manage to keep our love and hopes alive.
